about_the_game:
Our Kickstarter preregistration page is now live. Preregister now so you don't miss out when Kickstarter goes live sometime soon. You won't want to miss out all the cool early-bird perks.

LAST SOUL is a 2D Pixel-Art, Shooter, Action, Platformer with a compelling story about a future where mankind is losing its will to live.

Get cover



Use shields to protect yourself from the bullet hell that enemies spread towards you. You need to also use these shields as a platform when reaching the higher ground.

Dash



Dash and destroy. With dash, you are fast as F boi! Often the attack is the best defense.

Bullet time



Last Soul is a fast-paced game, and there is a lot’s going on around you. Control the time and use the bullet time to dodge enemies bullets.

Big guns



You need big guns to destroy big bosses. Collect them all and spread mayhem around you.

Fly like a hawk



Death from above! Use a jetpack and fly like a bird. Enemies don’t even notice what did hit them.


  • Play as an AI robot tasked with saving humanity.
  • Explore and fight your way through tens of distinct regions.
  • Enjoy the amazing PixelArt graphic and an immersive music style.
  • Evolve your character, unlock new and more powerful weapons and abilities.
  • Master special powers, including bullet time, jet pack, and shields.
  • Take on awesome boss fights, or die trying.
  • Make your best speedrunner time and show off on the leaderboard
  • Discover Easter Eggs, boost your points, and get a totally different skin from the rest
detailed_description:
Play Free Prologue


About the Game



Our Kickstarter preregistration page is now live. Preregister now so you don't miss out when Kickstarter goes live sometime soon. You won't want to miss out all the cool early-bird perks.

LAST SOUL is a 2D Pixel-Art, Shooter, Action, Platformer with a compelling story about a future where mankind is losing its will to live.

Get cover



Use shields to protect yourself from the bullet hell that enemies spread towards you. You need to also use these shields as a platform when reaching the higher ground.

Dash



Dash and destroy. With dash, you are fast as F boi! Often the attack is the best defense.

Bullet time



Last Soul is a fast-paced game, and there is a lot’s going on around you. Control the time and use the bullet time to dodge enemies bullets.

Big guns



You need big guns to destroy big bosses. Collect them all and spread mayhem around you.

Fly like a hawk



Death from above! Use a jetpack and fly like a bird. Enemies don’t even notice what did hit them.


  • Play as an AI robot tasked with saving humanity.
  • Explore and fight your way through tens of distinct regions.
  • Enjoy the amazing PixelArt graphic and an immersive music style.
  • Evolve your character, unlock new and more powerful weapons and abilities.
  • Master special powers, including bullet time, jet pack, and shields.
  • Take on awesome boss fights, or die trying.
  • Make your best speedrunner time and show off on the leaderboard
  • Discover Easter Eggs, boost your points, and get a totally different skin from the rest
legal_notice: All rights related to "LAST SOUL" belong to Wulum Ltd.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina or Later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina or Later
  • Processor: Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Last Soul

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equiv. 2Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equiv. 2Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews:
“It’s a fun looking game with vibrant pixel art visuals and challenging old school action platforming gameplay.”
Alphabetagamer

“The visual style of the game also stands out with very detailed pixel-art, memorable character designs, and vivid colors.”
GameRamble
short_description: Shoot them all, jump, climb, use jetpack, shields, and platforms, slow time, and discover secrets on this hectic Sci-Fi adventure where you become the last hope of mankind in the shape of an awesome robot.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Danish, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
